City: Richardson
Area: East Richardson
Category: Black-Owned, Brunch, Lounge, Happy Hour
🕒 When to Go: Evenings (4pm-2am) & weekend brunch
📅 Days: Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday
💰 Cost: $$

Sidecar Social

A 20,000 sq. ft. social lounge offering craft cocktails, scratch-made bites, classic games, live music, and massive TVs for sports viewing.

City: Addison
Area: Addison Circle
Category: Restaurant/Bar, Lounge, Day Party, Brunch, Date Spot, Happy Hour, Sports Bar
